aircraft.value: Phantom Stealth - AC-2969-578 at Forward Operating Base-3

defect_observed.value: Turbine blade tip erosion. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Engine Control component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

preventive_action.value: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 05/03/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 06/03/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 08/03/2024 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 09/03/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 12/03/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Turbine blade tip erosion. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Engine Control component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
